long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take the guesswork out of prompt engineering with Promptly AI, the Chrome extension that instantly rephrases and optimizes your questions for ChatGPT, Claude and Perplexity. Whether you're creating content, brainstorming ideas, or seeking answers, Promptly AI transforms your input to get the most effective and relevant responses.

Key Features:
- One-Click Optimization: Just type your question and let Promptly AI refine it instantly.
- Enhanced AI Responses: Receive clearer, more precise answers tailored to your needs.
- Favorite Prompts: Click on the extension icon on the top right to open the side panel and save your favorite prompts. Copy and paste easily!

Make your AI interactions smoother and more productive. Get Promptly AI today for the best AI results with a single click!

Homepage: https://www.promptly.fyi/
